metadata.title: CVE-2017-15428 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low
metadata.description: Insufficient data validation in V8 builtins string generator could lead toout of bounds read and write access in V8 in Google Chrome prior to62.0.3202.94 and allowed a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code insidea sandbox via a crafted HTML page.

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
